Sentencas: Thermochemical conversion of biomass is a promising option to produce energy-dense liquid biofuels, aiming to phase out fossil fuels from the transportation sector.
Titulo: Flexible methanol production units coupling solid oxide cells and thermochemical biomass conversion via different gasification technologies

Sentencas: Integration of renewable electricity boosts biofuel yield and carbon conversion from the scarce biomass resource, creating an indirect electrification of the transportation sector.
Titulo: Flexible methanol production units coupling solid oxide cells and thermochemical biomass conversion via different gasification technologies

Sentencas: Coupling biomass gasification and solid oxide cells (SOC), able to run in both electrolysis and fuel cell mode, constitutes the framework for flexible biofuel production.
Titulo: Flexible methanol production units coupling solid oxide cells and thermochemical biomass conversion via different gasification technologies

Sentencas: This paper compares the performance of five novel plant configurations for flexible biomass conversion to methanol and power.
Titulo: Flexible methanol production units coupling solid oxide cells and thermochemical biomass conversion via different gasification technologies

Sentencas: The plant performance is evaluated at five different operation modes: high production of methanol at low/intermediate electricity prices, co-production of electricity and methanol at high prices, and production of electricity without methanol co-production at price peaks.
Titulo: Flexible methanol production units coupling solid oxide cells and thermochemical biomass conversion via different gasification technologies

Sentencas: A TwoStage gasifier, a bubbling fluidized bed and an entrained flow gasifier are chosen as gasification technologies.
Titulo: Flexible methanol production units coupling solid oxide cells and thermochemical biomass conversion via different gasification technologies

Sentencas: The systems are thermodynamically modeled, and analyzed in terms of efficiency and carbon conversion.
Titulo: Flexible methanol production units coupling solid oxide cells and thermochemical biomass conversion via different gasification technologies

Sentencas: The highest efficiencies are achieved with the systems based on TwoStage Electro-gasifier (71%) and entrained flow gasification with pyrolysis as fuel pre-treatment (72%).
Titulo: Flexible methanol production units coupling solid oxide cells and thermochemical biomass conversion via different gasification technologies

Sentencas: The flexibility achieved by this technology combination enables high capacity factors, important for an accelerated commercialization of thermochemical biomass conversion.
Titulo: Flexible methanol production units coupling solid oxide cells and thermochemical biomass conversion via different gasification technologies
